SheetShow
=========

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/wetneb/sheetshow.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/wetneb/sheetshow) [![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/sheetshow/badge/?version=latest)](https://sheetshow.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest) [![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/wetneb/sheetshow/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/github/wetneb/sheetshow?branch=master)

A renderer for sheet diagrams in bimonoidal categories. Use it at https://wetneb.github.io/sheetshow/.

The diagrams generated by this renderer are defined in:

* [Cole Comfort](https://www.cs.ox.ac.uk/people/cole.comfort/), [Antonin Delpeuch](http://antonin.delpeuch.eu), [Jules Hedges](https://julesh.com). Sheet diagrams for bimonoidal categories. [arXiv:2010.13361](https://arxiv.org/abs/2010.13361)

![Sample sheet diagram](https://sheetshow.readthedocs.io/en/latest/_images/sheet_diagram.svg)

A collection of sample diagrams:
* [Controlled
  NOT gate](https://wetneb.github.io/sheetshow/#)
* [Add yours here](https://github.com/wetneb/sheetshow/edit/master/README.md)
